plot: A dramatic short about a young girl's growing awareness of the powers she has - and doesn't have - Valentines is the heartbreaking story of three teenagers caught in a tangled web of sex and money.
title: Valentines
plot_es: A dramatic short about a young girl's growing awareness of the powers she has - and doesn't have - Valentines is the heartbreaking story of three teenagers caught in a tangled web of sex and money.
